TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content: Is anyone else having trouble downloading the new pack? Downloading this on a mac, I keep getting stuck decompressing the file, or getting decompression failure (on another mac). Is there perhaps a mirror, or some way of getting around this issue?

Is anyone else having trouble downloading the new pack? Downloading this on a mac, I keep getting stuck decompressing the file, or getting decompression failure (on another mac). Is there perhaps a mirror, or some way of getting around this issue?

[Troll]Maybe the Mac is the problem ? [/Troll]

Is anyone else having trouble downloading the new pack? Downloading this on a mac, I keep getting stuck decompressing the file, or getting decompression failure (on another mac). Is there perhaps a mirror, or some way of getting around this issue?

Have you tryed forcing it to unzip by using terminal (going into terminal writing unzip dragging the file in and pressing space.)

Is he working on ESA?

Because i would love an update to DSL or PSR.
Until we can get damned robotics fix they're broken. But we are working on something for MEM, details soon.

Until we can get damned robotics fix they're broken. But we are working on something for MEM, details soon.

Mun Buggy????

ive a problem with the Promotheus solar rover, I landed on Moho with it but the wheels are in the ground, is this because it is a old version?

Pic:
The rover isn't updated to .20, that's why.
I've got many issues to fix before making a 0.20.x release. Both rovers are broken.
Whenever i try to extract the file it says that "File 'VAB' is password protected...". I just downloaded the latest version on the spaceport just to let you know.
Sounds like an administrator problem. Do you have access to all the files on your HD?
Before and after that I installed other mods with no problem...

Mun Buggy????

cough *Saturn V* cough

I only learned about it just now but I thought it was interesting enough to throw you a question:

Ever think about making the ESA's Mars Express w/Beagle-2? I know it failed and all but it doesn't seem too complex, goes well with your other mars vehicles, was created by the ESA (Yes I know the Beagle-2 lander was British not French), and the launch vehicle (Soyuz-FG/Fregat) has already been made for you by Bobcat!

I know you got other projects but I was just curious if you had any interest, past, present, or future for this. The lander may have failed but the Mars Express was historic nontheless. Not only was it the ESA's first mission to Mars and the first Russian launch to leave LEO since the days of the Soviet Union but it was also one of the fastest trips to the Red Planet as it and the Earth were the closest they'd been in 60,000 years! I think it deserves a spot among your ESA pack and the rest of your fine work.

Edited June 19, 2013 by Good_Apollo

Right now, I'm finishing Ariane 4, and trying to fix the rover's issue.

All I can say is thre will be a LH probe/satellite pack, so you can make your own probes. Mars express and Beagle will be in it.

Nice to hear, look forward to it! And if I haven't mentioned before, my very sincere gratitude for all the work you and the others in LH have put into this game! <3

Ou habitez-vous en France? Je parle francaise parce que ma famille...my writing is meh.
